A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]] ''' was released on '''January 11, 2010''', at 22:07 UTC<ref>{{cite IRC log|Adura|file=2010-01-11_#minecraft.log|tz=standard|date=January 11, 2010|"(17:08:38) <Notch> click game. press F11."}}</ref>, which added fullscreen mode. It was announced on [[The Word of Notch]] at 22:25 UTC,<ref>[[wordofnotch:329337442|Fullscreen mode in indev]] – The Word of Notch, January 11, 2010</ref> by which time the [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100111-2210|next version]] had already been released.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* Fullscreen mode accessible via {{key|F11}}.
* The game now rescales if the window it is in rescales.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Fullscreen mode being randomly inaccessible.
